ChineseHoroscopePage.title: Chinese Horoscope
ChineseHoroscopePage.subtitle: Explore the wisdom of the Chinese zodiac. Discover your animal sign and its traits.
ChineseHoroscopePage.comingSoon: Detailed horoscopes and more coming soon for Chinese Astrology!
ChineseHoroscopePage.calculationNote: Note: This calculation is based on the Gregorian year. The Chinese New Year varies, so if you were born in January or February, your sign might differ.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Rabbit: Gentle, quiet, elegant, and alert; quick and skillful.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Dragon: Confident, intelligent, enthusiastic, and a natural leader.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Horse: Lively, active, energetic, and loves to be in a crowd.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Goat: Mild-mannered, shy, stable, sympathetic, and amicable.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Rooste: Observant, hardworking, resourceful, courageous, and talented.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Dog: Loyal, honest, amiable, kind, cautious, and prudent.
MayanHoroscopePage.title: Mayan Horoscope
MayanHoroscopePage.subtitle: Discover the ancient insights of Mayan astrology.
MayanHoroscopePage.comingSoon: More Mayan tools and calculations coming soon!
MayanHoroscopePage.question: Essential Question:
MayanHoroscopePage.kinCalculatorDescript: The Mayan Kin is a unit of time and energy in the Tzolkin (sacred Mayan calendar). It represents your personal galactic signature, combining the energy of a Solar Seal and a Galactic Tone, offering insights into your purpose and life path.
MayanHoroscopePage.selectDatePrompt: Select your birth date to discover your Mayan Kin.
MayanHoroscopePage.errorCalculatingKin: Error calculating your Kin. Please check the date and try again.
MayanHoroscopePage.showCalculationExplan: See how your Kin is calculated
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep1: Base Date: July 26, 1987 (Kin 1: 1 Imix - Magnetic Dragon) is used as the starting point in the Dreamspell count.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep2: Days Elapsed: We calculate the total number of days between the base date and your birth date.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep3: Kin Number: Using modulo 260 (total kins in the Tzolkin), we get your Kin number (1-260). Simplified formula: Kin = ((DaysSinceBase + BaseKin - 1) % 260 + 260) % 260 + 1.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep4: Solar Seal (Nahual): Derived from the Kin number using modulo 20: (Kin - 1) % 20.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep5: Galactic Tone: Derived from the Kin number using modulo 13: (Kin - 1) % 13.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainNote: This is a modern interpretation (Dreamspell) of the Mayan Tzolkin. Other traditional counts exist.
MayanSign.Imix.description: Dragon/Crocodile - Represents the primordial sea, the source of all life, abundance, and new beginnings.
MayanSign.Imix.interpretation: Imix is the energy of pure initiation, nutrition, and maternal sustenance. It invites you to trust in the universe's abundance and dare to start anew. It's a day to connect with your most primal instincts and remember that anything is possible.
MayanSign.Ik.description: Wind - Symbolizes wind, breath, spirit, life force, communication, and inspiration.
MayanSign.Ik.interpretation: Ik is the breath of life, divine communication, and truth. It urges you to express your truth with clarity and to listen to the subtle messages of the spirit. It's a day for inspiration, new ideas, and connecting with the unseen.
MayanSign.Akbal.description: Night/House - Signifies night, darkness, the underworld, and the body. A place of mystery, dreams, and introspection.
MayanSign.Akbal.interpretation: Akbal immerses you in the mystery of darkness, the world of dreams, and deep introspection. It is a time to look inward, find peace in stillness, and discover the abundance that resides within your inner being. Trust your intuition.
MayanSign.Kan.description: Seed/Lizard - Represents the seed, maturation, manifestation, and the potential for growth.
MayanSign.Kan.interpretation: Kan is the seed of potential, ready to germinate and flourish. It reminds you of your inherent ability to grow, mature, and manifest your dreams. It is a day to plant intentions and focus on your personal and creative development.
MayanSign.Chicchan.description: Serpent - Symbolizes vitality, passion, instinct, life force, and transformation.
MayanSign.Chicchan.interpretation: Chicchan is pure life force, the kundalini energy that resides within you. It connects you to your instincts, your body, and your passion for life. It is a day for healing, transformation, and honoring the wisdom of your body.
MayanSign.Cimi.description: Death/Transformer/World-Bridger - Represents death, transformation, surrender, and detachment.
MayanSign.Cimi.interpretation: Cimi is the great transformer, the one who bridges worlds. It teaches you about detachment, surrender, and the beauty of the cycles of death and rebirth. It is a day to release the old and open yourself to new opportunities and perspectives.
MayanSign.Manik.description: Deer/Hand - Symbolizes completion, achievement, healing, and spiritual tools.
MayanSign.Manik.interpretation: Manik is the healing hand, the tool of accomplishment and knowledge. It guides you towards the completion of your projects and reminds you of your power to heal and create. It is a day for action, generosity, and the manifestation of your gifts.
MayanSign.Lamat.description: Star/Rabbit - Represents the star, harmony, abundance, beauty, and art.
MayanSign.Lamat.interpretation: Lamat is the star that shines with harmony and beauty, attracting abundance. It inspires you to create, to find elegance in all things, and to multiply your talents. It is a day for creativity, fertility, and the appreciation of art.
MayanSign.Muluc.description: Water/Moon - Symbolizes water, emotions, purification, and the flow of life.
MayanSign.Muluc.interpretation: Muluc is the primordial water, the essence of emotions and purification. It invites you to flow with life, to cleanse your emotions, and to remember your connection with universal consciousness. It is a day for emotional introspection and renewal.
MayanSign.Oc.description: Dog - Represents loyalty, companionship, guidance, and unconditional love.
MayanSign.Oc.interpretation: Oc is the loyal companion, the loving guide who accompanies you on your path. It teaches you about unconditional love, faithfulness, and the importance of true relationships. It is a day to connect with your loved ones and open your heart.
MayanSign.Chuen.description: Monkey - Symbolizes joy, creativity, art, play, and magic.
MayanSign.Chuen.interpretation: Chuen is the artist, the magician, the weaver of illusion and joy. It encourages you to play, to be creative, and to find magic in the everyday. It is a day for spontaneity, fun, and artistic expression.
MayanSign.Eb.description: Road/Grass - Represents the path, the journey, free will, and vitality.
MayanSign.Eb.interpretation: Eb is the path of life, free will, and the vitality that springs from the earth. It reminds you that you have the power to choose your path and connects you with the abundance of nature. It is a day for making conscious decisions and giving thanks for blessings.
MayanSign.Ben.description: Reed/Skywalker - Symbolizes pillars of light, connecting heaven and earth, courage, and exploration.
MayanSign.Ben.interpretation: Ben is the skywalker, the pillar that unites heaven and earth. It instills in you the courage to explore new horizons and expand your consciousness. It is a day for growth, adventure, and connecting with your inner wisdom.
MayanSign.Ix.description: Jaguar/Wizard - Represents shamanism, magic, intuition, and the mysteries of the earth's heart.
MayanSign.Ix.interpretation: Ix is the wizard, the jaguar that sees in the dark and knows the secrets of the earth. It connects you with your intuition, your inner power, and the magic of the universe. It is a day for introspection, integrity, and connecting with the sacred.
MayanSign.Men.description: Eagle - Symbolizes vision, ambition, higher consciousness, and the collective mind.
MayanSign.Men.interpretation: Men is the eagle that soars high, with a clear vision and a connection to higher consciousness. It inspires you to pursue your loftiest dreams and to trust in your vision. It is a day for hope, ambition, and mental expansion.
MayanSign.Cib.description: Vulture/Owl/Warrior - Represents wisdom, introspection, ancestral knowledge, and forgiveness.
MayanSign.Cib.interpretation: Cib is the wise warrior, the one who extracts knowledge from past and ancestral experiences. It teaches you about forgiveness, trust, and the ability to face your fears. It is a day for deep introspection and connecting with inner wisdom.
MayanSign.Caban.description: Earth/Earthquake - Symbolizes the earth, synchronicity, navigation, and evolution.
MayanSign.Caban.interpretation: Caban is the force of the Earth, synchronicity, and constant evolution. It helps you navigate life's changes and stay centered on your purpose. It is a day for alignment, gratitude for Mother Earth, and adaptation.
MayanSign.Etznab.description: Flint/Knife/Mirror - Represents truth, clarity, discernment, and sacrifice.
MayanSign.Etznab.interpretation: Etznab is the mirror of truth, the knife that cuts through illusion and brings clarity. It challenges you to face the truth, to make decisions with discernment, and to release what no longer serves you. It is a day for radical honesty and self-reflection.
MayanSign.Cauac.description: Storm/Rain - Symbolizes the storm, purification, transformation, and renewal.
MayanSign.Cauac.interpretation: Cauac is the storm that purifies, transforms, and renews. It brings you the energy needed to release old patterns and catalyze profound changes. It is a day for energetic cleansing, activation, and welcoming transformation.
MayanSign.Ahau.description: Sun/Flower/Lord/Enlightenment - Represents enlightenment, unconditional love, wholeness, and connection with the divine.
MayanSign.Ahau.interpretation: Ahau is enlightenment, the Central Sun, the expression of unconditional love and mastery. It connects you with your inner divinity and reminds you of your ability to radiate light and love. It is a day for celebration, gratitude, and union with the All.
GalacticTone.Magnetic.name: Magnetic
GalacticTone.Magnetic.question: What is my purpose?
GalacticTone.Magnetic.interpretation: The Magnetic Tone is the beginning, the one that attracts purpose. It unifies all parts of your being to focus on a clear goal. Today, ask yourself: What is my true intention? What do I want to attract into my life?
GalacticTone.Lunar.name: Lunar
GalacticTone.Lunar.question: What are my challenges?
GalacticTone.Lunar.interpretation: The Lunar Tone reveals duality and challenges. It helps you identify the obstacles you need to overcome to achieve your purpose. Today, reflect: What polarities exist in my situation? What are the challenges that strengthen me?
GalacticTone.Electric.name: Electric
GalacticTone.Electric.question: How can I best serve?
GalacticTone.Electric.interpretation: The Electric Tone activates service. It is energy in motion, the spark that ignites action. It asks you how you can put your talents at the service of a greater purpose. Today, consider: How can I activate my resources? In what way does my service benefit others?
GalacticTone.SelfExisting.name: Self-Existing
GalacticTone.SelfExisting.question: What is the form of action?
GalacticTone.SelfExisting.interpretation: The Self-Existing Tone defines the form of action. It gives structure and measure to your purpose. It helps you establish the foundations and understand how to manifest your ideas. Today, think: What is the most effective form for my action? What patterns and measures do I need to establish?
GalacticTone.Overtone.name: Overtone
GalacticTone.Overtone.question: How can I empower myself?
GalacticTone.Overtone.interpretation: The Overtone Tone commands radiance and inner power. It gathers resources and gives you the authority to shine. Today, focus on: How can I gather my strengths and resources? In what way do I radiate my personal power?
GalacticTone.Rhythmic.name: Rhythmic
GalacticTone.Rhythmic.question: How do I organize for equality?
GalacticTone.Rhythmic.interpretation: The Rhythmic Tone organizes for equality and balance. It helps you find balance in the flow of life and manage challenges organically. Today, seek: How can I balance my life and my actions? How do I organize my environment for harmony?
GalacticTone.Resonant.name: Resonant
GalacticTone.Resonant.question: How can I attune my service to others?
GalacticTone.Resonant.interpretation: The Resonant Tone channels attunement and inspiration. It connects you to the source of wisdom and allows you to vibrate in harmony with the universe. Today, attune to: What truly inspires me? How can I align my being with my highest purpose?
GalacticTone.Galactic.name: Galactic
GalacticTone.Galactic.question: Do I live what I believe?
GalacticTone.Galactic.interpretation: The Galactic Tone models integrity and harmony. It invites you to live according to your beliefs and act with coherence. Today, examine: Do my actions reflect my values? Am I living in integrity with my truth?
GalacticTone.Solar.name: Solar
GalacticTone.Solar.question: How do I achieve my purpose?
GalacticTone.Solar.interpretation: The Solar Tone pulses intention and realization. It gives you the final push to manifest your purpose and achieve your goals. Today, ask yourself: How can I direct my energy towards the realization of my intention? What concrete steps should I take?
GalacticTone.Planetary.name: Planetary
GalacticTone.Planetary.question: How do I perfect what I do?
GalacticTone.Planetary.interpretation: The Planetary Tone perfects manifestation. It produces what you have intended, making your vision tangible. Today, focus on: How can I improve and perfect my creation? What is manifesting through me?
GalacticTone.Spectral.name: Spectral
GalacticTone.Spectral.question: How do I release and let go?
GalacticTone.Spectral.interpretation: The Spectral Tone dissolves and liberates. It helps you release what no longer serves, disintegrate old structures, and open space for the new. Today, consider: What do I need to release in my life? How can I let go of ties and limitations?
GalacticTone.Crystal.name: Crystal
GalacticTone.Crystal.question: How can I dedicate to cooperation?
GalacticTone.Crystal.interpretation: The Crystal Tone dedicates to cooperation and universalization. It teaches you to share your gifts and work together for a greater good. Today, reflect: How can I collaborate with others? In what way do my actions contribute to the community?
GalacticTone.Cosmic.name: Cosmic
GalacticTone.Cosmic.question: How do I expand my joy and love?
GalacticTone.Cosmic.interpretation: The Cosmic Tone transcends with presence and endurance. It is the return to the origin and the expansion of consciousness. It invites you to live fully in the present and to radiate love and joy. Today, experience: How can I be more present? How do I expand my joy and love without limits?
